org.workin.core.persistence.ibatis
接口 SqlMapPersistence

所有已知实现类：
SqlMapPersistenceImpl
public interface SqlMapPersistence

作者：
G.Lee

方法摘要
 java.util.List findListBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId, java.lang.Object parameterObject)
          Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects.
 java.util.Map findMapBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId, java.lang.Object parameterObject, java.lang.String key)
          Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects that will be keyed into a Map.
 java.util.Map findMapBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId, java.lang.Object parameterObject, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
          Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects from which one property will be keyed into a Map.
 java.lang.Object findObjectBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId, java.lang.Object parameterObject)
          Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a single object instance.
 PaginationSupport findPaginatedBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId, java.lang.Object parameterObject, int offset, int maxRows)
          Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects within a certain range.
 

方法详细信息

findListBySqlMap

java.util.List findListBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                java.lang.Object parameterObject)
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
返回：
A List of result objects.
抛出：
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - -If an error occurs.but usually throws DataAccessException's subclass

findMapBySqlMap

java.util.Map findMapBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                              java.lang.Object parameterObject,
                              java.lang.String key)
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects that will be keyed into a Map.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

参数：
sqlMapId - The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
key - The property to be used as the key in the Map.
返回：
A Map keyed by keyProp with values being the result object instance.
抛出：
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - - If an error occurs.but usually throws DataAccessException's subclass

findMapBySqlMap

java.util.Map findMapBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                              java.lang.Object parameterObject,
                              java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String value)
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects from which one property will be keyed into a Map.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
key - -The property to be used as the key in the Map.
value - -The property to be used as the value in the Map.
返回：
A Map keyed by keyProp with values of valueProp.
抛出：
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - -If an error occurs.but usually throws DataAccessException's subclass

findObjectBySqlMap

java.lang.Object findObjectBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                    java.lang.Object parameterObject)
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a single object instance.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement. Throws: java.sql.SQLException

参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
返回：
The single result object populated with the result set data, or null if no result was found
抛出：
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - -If an error occurs.but usually throws DataAccessException's subclass

findPaginatedBySqlMap

PaginationSupport findPaginatedBySqlMap(java.lang.String sqlMapId,
                                        java.lang.Object parameterObject,
                                        int offset,
                                        int maxRows)
Executes a mapped SQL SELECT statement that returns data to populate a number of result objects within a certain range.

The parameter object is generally used to supply the input data for the WHERE clause parameter(s) of the SELECT statement.

参数：
sqlMapId - -The name of the statement to execute.
parameterObject - -The parameter object (e.g. JavaBean, Map, XML etc.).
offset - -The number of results to ignore.
maxRows - -The maximum number of results to return.
返回：
A List of result objects.
抛出：
org.springframework.dao.DataAccessException - -If an error occurs.but usually throws DataAccessException's subclass
